text: to jab se ve usase niraash ho gae to paraamarsh karane ke lie alag ja baithe. unamen jo bada tha, vah kahane laga, "kya tum jaanate nahin ki tumhaara baap allaah ke naam par tumase vachan le chuka hai aur usako jo isase pahale yoosuf ke maamale mein tumase qasoor ho chuka hai? main to is bhoo-bhaag se kadaapi talane ka nahin jab tak ki mere baap mujhe anumati na den ya allaah hee mere haq mein koee faisala kar de. aur vahee sabase achchha faisala karanevaala hai
